body_html: Well it is CPU bound if you have 8 GPUs and 8 Python threads queuing the work, but as long as your data processing pipeline is ahead of the GPU (because you have fast disks and 40 cores, so you still have 32 free), then you can still keep pushing more work there
body_text: Well it is CPU bound if you have 8 GPUs and 8 Python threads queuing the work, but as long as your data processing pipeline is ahead of the GPU (because you have fast disks and 40 cores, so you still have 32 free), then you can still keep pushing more work there
body: Well it is CPU bound if you have 8 GPUs and 8 Python threads queuing the work, but as long as your data processing pipeline is ahead of the GPU (because you have fast disks and 40 cores, so you still have 32 free), then you can still keep pushing more work there
